e.detail:
Fireball Turret: DC 20 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    initiative +2, 1 attack per round, affects all targets within a 20 ft. radius burst, DC 12 save or take 18d10 fire damage

i.detail:
Collapsing Ceiling: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 40 ft. square area, DC 15 save or take 18d10 damage

r.detail:
Fireball Turret: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    initiative +2, 1 attack per round, affects all targets within a 20 ft. radius burst, DC 15 save or take 18d10 fire damage

s.detail:
Clockwork Chain Flail: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    initiative +4, speed 30 feet, 1 attack per round, +7 to hit against all targets within 10 ft., 18d10 bludgeoning damage and knocked prone

u.detail: The walls here have been engraved with arcane symbols
u.summary: The walls here have been engraved with arcane symbols

details.history: The dungeon was created by a neutral wizard as a temple. Its creator was destroyed by a natural disaster, and the dungeon has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.temperature:
Very Hot (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

wandering_monsters.1: Horned Devil (cr 11, mm 74) and 1 x Bearded Devil (cr 3, mm 70); deadly, 7900 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.2: Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154) and 1 x Red Dragon Wyrmling (cr 4, mm 98); hard, 6100 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.3: 14 x Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272); easy, 700 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: 2 x Duergar Screamer (cr 3, motm 112, mtf 190) and 4 x Duergar (cr 1, mm 122); medium, 2200 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.5: 9 x Skeleton (cr 1/4, mm 272) and 9 x Warhorse Skeleton (cr 1/2, mm 273); medium, 1350 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
